Text:
The only truthful thing about this show is its title.

Socialists call themselves "liberals" and "progressive" these days, but that's nothing but false advertising.

They think they're smart, "scientificated", and witty - because politically motivated individuals tell them so in order to control them.  They don't feel the need to know anything beyond that.

Hey Alex, shut the fuck up.

The Ku Klux Klan calls themselves Republicans and Libertarians these days, which is why your boy Romney is having his ass handed to him.

Just shut up, bend over, grab your ankles, grit your teeth and take this Democratic assfucking like a man. 

Stop your fighting it. When you struggle, it only makes our dicks HARDER.... :-p
